QuestData.Title: One Draenei's Junk...
QuestData.Description: A shard of glimmering rock sits before you. You sense that this item would be of value to someone within the Blasted Lands.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the Imperfect Draenethyst Fragment to Kum'isha the Collector in Blasted Lands.
QuestData.RewardText: Just a shard? Pfuh! This gets me nothing! Take your reward and get out of my sight.$B$BSounds familiar? It should, because I say it a thousand times per day.$B$BOh how I loathe this world.
